item.title: GM
item.description: score:-96 Chances: General Motors Company (GM) closed at $36.70, indicating a +1.97% shift from the previous trading day. Value investing is essentially about selecting stocks that are usually cheap but fundamentally sound. PK, GM, GPK and ITRI boast a low P/CF ratio. General Motors Company (GM) has been one of the stocks most watched by Zacks.

item.title: SEDG
item.description: score:-56 Chances: The Fed meeting spurred confidence in lower inflation and lower interest rates in 2024. Analysts are expecting solar stocks to rebound on increased solar panel installations in 2024. Risks: Solar industry growth in Europe has decelerated due to surplus inventories and reduced demand in crucial markets.

item.title: AMD
item.description: score:-15 Chances: The White House’s announcement of the first grant for semiconductor manufacturing in the U.S. is a positive catalyst for chip stocks. Analysts believe that Nvidia Corporation controls roughly 80% of the AI chip market, but its rivals, including Advanced Micro Devices Inc, are making significant efforts to catch up.
